11.content: Which of the inuyasha girls would you like to girl or would you like to shrink a boy?
11.title: inuyasha

choices: To hungrey just eat them raw.
111.content:
Sango was sitting on the side of a river they had stopped at one day. Kirara and Shippo were playing over on the other side of the river, Miroku and Inuyasha had gone ahead looking for a place to stay for the night, and Kagome was sitting in the river relaxing. All of the sudden Sango felt a strange dissying sensation in her head. She blacked out.

**********************

When she woke up several hours later the first thing she noticed was that there was a small little trickle of water next to her and what appeard to be 3 tiny bugs. She looked around and noticed that the plants looked kind of like trees... no that was impossible. She looked at the bugs closer and noticed that it was a very terrified looking Kagome, Shippo, and Kirara.

"I'm hungrey" she thinks. She looks down at Kagome, shippo, and Kirara. She started salivating thinking of what she could make with them. She could make a nice little cooked Kagome with a side of Fox and Cat. Or she could just eat them raw. When she thought about it for a little while the fabric on kagome would taste horrible same thing with shippo. She lifted them up and removed their clothes. Which meal does she decide to make?
111.title: Giantess Sango

choices: Sango has to find another way to light the fire
1111.content: Sango wasen't all that hungrey and knew that they would probably taste a bit better cooked so she took a bunch of the trees without even trying and put them in a big pile. Than it struck her that she had nothing to start a fire with. "Hmmmmmmmm..." she said outloud. Kagome and Shippo still to terrified to say anything just thought of what was going to happen to them. "I got it!" Sango said. she placed Kagome and Shippo on top of the wood and started looking around for what she needed. She found Kirara and said "Kirara I need you to transform right there" and she points to the bottom of the wood pile. Kagome yells at the top of her lungs "HAVE YOU GONE COMPLETELY ENTIRELY INSANE!?!
1111.title: Cooked meal

Washu was working in her lab for a large majority of the day. She squeled in delight as she held it over her hands triumphantly!

"Finished!" She yelled out happily, quite proud of herself. She set it down on the ground and noticed her stomach growling fearcly. She noticed this, placed a hand on her stomach, and sighed. She had been working all day and niglected to eat anything at all.

"I think I'll go make a snack," she said, as she began to walk out the door. Just them, the strange machine that Washu had just finished began to glow and shake violently. It then shot out a beam that...
141.title: Tenchi Muyo: No Need for Giantess

First, Washu didn't notice anything. Then, Washu noticed she was getting bigger! Up, up, up she grew! She rushed out of the house, which she quickly outgrew. She didn't stop growing until she was 150 feet tall! Her clothes had expanded with her.

"Whoa" said Washu. "this is cool"

Washu's stomach growled once again.

"What to eat?" asked Washu.
1411.title: BIG Washu

141222.title: The thick-headed detective

choices: Mimi wakes up in downtown Tokyo as a giantess
The stranger has moved on to another digi-destined to control.
143.content:
The digital world.

"Teh digital world," is actually what a sign read that Mimi passed when she found herself walking through a strange forest.

It had been a long time since she had last been in the digital world, and none of those times seemed this dangerous. Something was wrong. Glitches ravaged everything in sight. The clarity of objects becoming a fluttering patern of squares every once in awhile.

"Mimi," came a simple commanding voice from behind her. Spinning around the girl dressed in her usual pink cowgirl outfit gasped. Putting two gloved hands to her mouth she stepped back, away from the stranger.

Shaking her head she cried, "What do you want? Why am I here? I was in my bed just moments ago!"

"The digi-destined are always connected to the digital world dear Mimi. Even those legacy forgets over time. It may be years later, but to me, you still ruined this world. Changing it forever, you and your friends," She was a strange girl, wearing a gray teeshirt, opened with a dress shirt on like it was an overshirt. Baggy and dull colored blue jeans wore low over her shoes. Her hair was startlingly white and spiked. Eyes a faded blue.

On her arm, the stranger wore what looked like a small keyboard that had several wires running to various devices covering her clothes.

She grinned, "It's all part of my master plan Mimi. I can control you, or any of your friends. But I can control you in your world. It's time I repayed you for tampering with the digital world."

Fear gripped Mimi, "Oh, this isn't good at all! Comon Mimi, you've got to wake up!"

The stranger raised an eyebrow, "One threat and you're already talking to yourself? This will be easy as anything. It's time Mimi. My puppet. It's time for you to turn your world upside down!"

With a few presses on her arm keyboard, the stranger laughed as Mimi felt light headed and fell to the soft grass below.

"Please Mimi, wake up," She pleaded to herself.
143.title: A digital disturbance, controlling Mimi

choices: Mimi goes after the crouds quickly, squishing and eating all she can.
Mimi takes her time, tormenting each tiny morsel she catches slowly.
1431.content:
Slowly Mimi opened her eyes, a groggy sensation passing as she brought herself into a sitting position. Her hearing was so dulled that she could barely hear the cars screeching around her. When her senses finally came to, the gigantic cowgirl leapt back at the sound.

Shielding her face Mimi cried out, "No! Don't hit me!" A long pause followed. Soundless, save for the rush of wind. Slowly, she opened her gloved fingers and looked about. She must be way outside of the city, the buildings looked so tiny from here.

When Mimi lowered her hands, thats when it hit her. A cold rush blasted through the girl as she took in the sight around her. The cowgirl found herself smack dab in the middle of an intersection. Cars all around her, now the occasional sound of a honking horn, and then finally utter chaos. This was due to moreso the fact that Mimi, was now stories upon stories tall!

"Oh my! I almost hurt you people! I'm so," before Mimi could finish her thought, she heard the strange girls voice in her mind.

It was almost in pain, "Oh come on! Give me a break. You're really a digi-destined? What was your specialty? How to wuss out of every situation. Well we're going to fix that now!"

Mimi gritted her teeth as a loud buzzing sound echoed in her ears. When it finally subsided, her mind felt clear and ready. Though she slightly knew she wasn't thinking anything like herself.

Glaring down at the cars around her she growled, "Silence! Stop honking at me!" With that, she planted one of her short boots on top of a group of cars, mashing them flat.

"I hunger," she began, eyes scanning the streets, full of pedestrians. "Simply consuming each and every one of you isn't enough. I want y'all to struggle fiercly as I gobble you all up!" From the soft spoken, high pitch of Mimi's voice, none of this sounded right.

Mimi thought to herself that her feelings didn't seem right. However, a moment later she had a horrible headache that only went away when she drilled her gloved fist into a tiny car on the street below. Considering that something was wrong brought Mimi pain. She decided against further questioning.

She tore off her gloves, slid out of her boots and pulled her pink socks off, and discareded her cowboy hat, ruffling up her mousey brown hair. "That feels better. If I accidentally take out any of you with my wandering paws, I want to be sure I feel it," She giggled at the idea.

"Now run," Mimi demanded, turning over so she was resting on her hands and knees, "I want to hunt my prey through the city streets!"

The crowds around her didn't wait to see if she was serious before they all furiously tried to escape the area.
1431.title: Giantess Mimi in downtown Tokyo

choices: Round up a lot of people and eat them in both hands.
Start steping on the crouds, only enough to make them stay still.
14311.content:
Crawling quickly on her hands and knees, the cowgirl caught up with the back few people in the crowds. They turned to see the bright eyes of the gigantic brunette as she started down eagerly, mouth open and dripping with eager saliva.

"My first taste," Mimi's voice came in gasps, "Prey to be lapped up into my mouth." An eager hand slammed down on a street corner, crushing a few people under her soft palm, "To be slowly tormented by my tongue, swirled about." She leaned in closer, and off to the other side, her hand reaching out to the far street corner, "Eaten by me, possibly even slowly chewed up but left alive as I swallow you down to become part of me deep inside. Are you ready my tiny victems?"

With that, the giant girls hair fell to the pavement, moments before her tongue eagerly lapped at the gritty ground and began pulling members of the crowd into her mouth. They stuck to her tongue with ease, unable to get free before it was too late. The first few she didnt care. She gulped them eagerly, crunched the odd one between her teeth, and even spent some time jabbing a few into the pavement with the tip of her tongue. The cruel giantess couldn't resist, and as her excitement rose, she didn't even consider thinking about why she was doing this.

"Run! Struggle to get free from your giant predator! All of you will become my food," Mimi growled as she rubbed her tummy with an eager hand. "I want to feel more of you struggling within my stomach. Tiny snacks, trying in vain to save your lives that belong to me the moment my eyes catch sight of you. Foolish creatures."

Mimi dipped her hand into the fleeing crowd. Closing it, she raised a handful of people to her mouth. Laughing wildly she licked her lips, saliva covering them and falling from her mouth on top of the horrified people in her clenched palm.

They looked up at the laughing menace, a giant girl with a sweet smile and such beauty. But there she was, spots of blood it seemed on her cheeks from people who were crushed into the ground by her face, and lips that held dots of the same crimson color.

Her fingers, seemingly to stretch into the sky all around them, opened slightly as the impossibly huge head of the digi-destined girl dipped down into her hand. Her lips loomed closer, but the true fear raced through the people whom were struggling to get free and fall to the ground below when she bared her teeth, ready to take a bite directly into the crowd.

They struggled against her soft wrinkles of her hand, struggling in tiny pools of saliva, struggling, but for nothing. Mimi cruely bit into the crowd and raised her head high, struggling people trapped between the beautiful giantess teeth and lips, her hair glowing behind a bright moon in the night sky. The vicious feminine monster tipped her head up toward the sky and let her catch slide into her mouth. Many tiny tickling sensations could be felt across her tongue, a few near her molars were popped quickly as she closed her mouth.

Below in her hand, some of the survivors huddled together, covered in saliva and wounds from the vicious chomp. They watched on as the girls huge throat eagerly gulped and swallowed everything in her mouth. All those people that were struggling against the girls soft hand with them were now on their way down into her tummy.

"Absolutly yummy!" Mimi laughed before she began to lap at her palm. Her head came down in a rush and without a second though, her gigantic tongue darted out like she was lapping away at an icecream cone. Person after person was slurped up and either met a fate of struggling to fend off Mimi's tongue to avoid her teeth clenching down again and again, so softly as only to wound her prey, or to just be carelessly gulped, and forgotten as she dove in for more.

Laughter echoed from the titanic girl as she looked down at all the people fleeing from her, "Try as you might!" She snapped, "But sooner or later, you'll all end up in my tummy where you belong."

Arching her leg forward, Mimi mashed her bare foot down on a small crowd trying to get away to her right. The soft sole of her foot provided some resistance, but a lot of them were plastered to her foot. This didn't seem to concern her as she used the same hand to smear up those whom were still alive and unable to escape now, and gulped them down too.

"Never try to sneak away," Mimi snarled at one who she had stuck to her finger, goopy from her saliva from sucking other people from her fingers already. "I really hate that." Her tongue lolled out and slowly made it's way up to the tiny person who was pulled in on the deep pink surface and slurped down a moment later.

This wouldn't stop her hunger, she needed a lot more people. Maybe she could gather them together. It felt like an obsession, and it was only getting worse. She needed more. Much more.
14311.title: Mimi begins gobbling up downtown Tokyo

143111.content:
Mimi began scooping up more and more people not even so much bothering to chew on them and merely swallowed them all whole.

Mimi: Absoultly delcious.

She laugh manically but gripped her stomach in pain.

*inside her stomach*

In eating everybody she failed to notcie that she ate a man in black and a man that looked like a clown

14522222211111.content:
(Hey! Author here! I want to say that, despite there being no confirmed names for a good majority of the Nyotalia girls, I'm using custom ones) Canada's belly growled as it sat empty, seemingly awaiting food that wouldn't ever arrive. She smiled, and rolled over, looking at her shrunken 2P.
Madison (no offence to anyone named Madison) was yelling, pounding her hands against the glass.
Canada yawned, and rolled back over. Although she was awfully hungry, she'd wait it out until the morning.

But Madeleine started thinking about feeling her 2P slide down her throat...Madison would make a yummy snack. Unconsciously, she patted her belly, and reached over to the glass. The female Canadian gently put the glass to her lips, and tilted it up, letting her prey slide into her awaiting mouth.

Madison shrieked as she entered the mouth, trying to get out.
14522222211111.title: 1P

145222222111111.content:
Canada mentally smiled as she rolled her tongue around her 2P. It felt...oddly gold, feeling Madison squirm about on her tongue. She hummed happily as her darker self tried to get up out of her maw, but she simply used her tongue to keep her back. Finally, Madeleine decided it was time, and tilted her head back, swallowing Madison in one fluid motion, tracing her path down her throat and into her gut.

Canada sighed as she felt her 2P arrive in her empty belly, but she couldn't decide on whether or not to have Madison go through her body, intact.
145222222111111.title: Play time

info.brief_description: Where anime women grow huge to have yummy snacks or chow down on shrunken men.
info.description:
As a follow-up to my other interactive story: Videogame giantess vore, this interactive story will cater to both giantess vore and the consumption of little peoples. The reason I created this was to expand the intent of my first story to those unfamiliar with videogames.

Have fun!

update - 1/13/04: Come on people! 372 views and not a single submision... *sigh*
